title: Jewel.Quest.Mysteries.Curse.of.the.Emerald.Tear.v1.0
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Jewel Quest Mysteries Curse of the Emerald Tear v1.0 (c) 2008 iWin Games
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Date: 09/11/2008
Developed by: iWin, Inc.
URL: http://www.jewelquestmysteries.com/


Game Description
````````````````
Rupert and Emma plunge into the land of ancient intrigue, Egypt. Seek out
treasures and jewels, hidden within stunning gardens and relic-laden palaces.
Swap jewels to turn tiles gold in classic Jewel Quest boards, and decipher
puzzles of logic and wit. A hidden object game shrouded in the lore of Jewel
Quest and the mystique of ancient Egypt.


Features
````````
* 18 stunning hidden object backgrounds
* Suspense-filled plot and captivating story
* Upgrades to enhance your game performance
* Music and sounds as real as the story's ancient mystery


Minimum Requirements
````````````````````
* Windows 2000/XP/Vista
* 1 GHz processor
* 512 MB RAM
* DirectX 7
* 32 MB video RAM
* 113 MB free disc space
* 16-bit Sound Card
* SVGA Graphics card (16bit)

------------------------------------------------------------------------
